distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for vim fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-20807: Fixed an issue where escaping from the restrictive mode of vim 
  was possible using interfaces (bsc#1172225 and bsc#1172031).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Vim before 8.1.0881, users can circumvent the rvim restricted mode and execute arbitrary OS commands via scripting interfaces (e.g., Python, Ruby, or Lua).
notes.title: CVE description
